snippet: For almost 40 years, Ms. Gray led a yearly anti-abortion protest with her battle cry of “No exception! No compromise!”
abstract: Nellie Gray, a steadfast opponent of abortion who for almost 40 years led a yearly protest march in Washington that drew tens of thousands of supporters, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: For almost 40 years, Ms. Gray led a yearly anti-abortion protest with her battle cry of “No exception! No compromise!”

headline.seo: Nellie Gray, Anti-Abortion Activist, Dies at 88
headline.main: Nellie Gray, Abortion Foe and Leader of Annual March, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Nellie Gray, 88, Abortion Foe and Leader of Annual March
